trans-unit.source: Represents the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 호출기 행을 나타내는 한 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the DetailsViewPagerRow is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 페이저 컨트롤을 저장 하기는 DetailsViewPagerRow 인스턴스의 만들어집니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the DetailsViewPagerRow control is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>인터페이스는 DetailsViewPagerRow 컨트롤의 일부 인지 여부를 나타내는 표식은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>개체의 컨트롤 계층 구조.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 주로 컨트롤 개발자가 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class to create a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 개발자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>생성자 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>사용자 지정 호출기 행을 만드는 클래스입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow"></xref> class.
The DetailsViewPagerRow constructor calls the base class constructor, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 기본 클래스 생성자를 호출 하는 DetailsViewPagerRow 생성자 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, 지정 된 매개 변수를 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the call is made with `rowIndex` equal to -1, `rowType` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>, and `rowState` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow>컨트롤에 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>와 호출 제어, `rowIndex` -1, `rowType` 같음 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>, 및 `rowState` <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> 같음</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
